puri.description: Puri Beach is one of the finest beaches in Eastern India. Known for its spiritual significance and natural beauty, this beach attracts millions of visitors annually. The golden sands stretch for kilometers along the Bay of Bengal, offering spectacular sunrise views and religious importance due to its proximity to the Jagannath Temple.
puri.bestTimeToVisit: October to February when the weather is pleasant with temperatures ranging from 15°C to 28°C
puri.howToReach: Nearest airport is Biju Patnaik International Airport, Bhubaneswar (60 km). Regular trains connect Puri to major cities. Well-connected by road network.

accommodation.luxury: Premium hotels with ocean view from ₹5000/night

tips: Early morning visits recommended for photography
puri.name: Puri Beach

kovalam.description: Kovalam is an internationally renowned beach destination featuring three adjacent crescent beaches. The southernmost, Lighthouse Beach, is the most popular. Known for its pristine waters and ayurvedic treatments, it offers a perfect blend of leisure and wellness.
kovalam.bestTimeToVisit: September to March when the weather is pleasant and ideal for water activities
kovalam.howToReach: Trivandrum International Airport is just 15 km away. Well-connected by road and rail networks.
kovalam.name: Kovalam Beach

radhanagar.description: Often rated as Asia's best beach, Radhanagar Beach (Beach No. 7) is known for its pristine white sands, turquoise waters, and lush green forest backdrop. This beach offers one of the most spectacular sunset views in India.
radhanagar.bestTimeToVisit: October to May, avoiding monsoon season
radhanagar.howToReach: Fly to Port Blair, then take a ferry to Havelock Island. The beach is 12 km from the jetty.
tips: Visit during early morning or sunset
radhanagar.name: Radhanagar Beach

marina.description: Marina Beach is the second-longest urban beach in the world, stretching for 13 kilometers along the Bay of Bengal. This historic beach features numerous landmarks, monuments, and is a cultural hub of Chennai.
marina.bestTimeToVisit: November to February when the weather is pleasant
marina.howToReach: Chennai International Airport is 15 km away. Well-connected by local transport.
marina.name: Marina Beach

rushikonda.howToReach: Visakhapatnam Airport is 20 km away. Well-connected by road and rail networks.
tips: Visit during early morning or evening
rushikonda.name: Rushikonda Beach

minicoy-thundi.howToReach: Fly to Agatti Airport, then take a boat to Minicoy Island.
